comments: Professor Mattice turned an absolutely boring class into something exciting. I learned so much from this course. Definitely gives great feedback and available for assistance.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Professor Mattice is very clear in her expectations and expects quality work of a college student. She is younger and more down to earth and personable. She has a non-profit for work place bullying and is passionate about it. She is connected and knowledgeable about the subject. She is also very encouraging.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Awesome professor, clear on assignments. Don\'t need to stay the entire time in class. Lectures for a bit and then allows class to leave. Assignments have clear directions. Quizzes, some work in class, research paper and presentation on your research topic. Would take professor again.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)

comments: Professor Mattice is a really tough grader. The class is pretty easy but she expects way too much. She is always in a hurry, stuck up mood, and has no patience. If your speech topic doesn\'t interest her, she\'ll most likely give you a bad grade. I highly recommend taking this course with another teacher.

comments: She is never in class. She expects way too much out of her students. Grades extremely hard and is stuck up.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: She spends the first 20-30 minutes lecturing and then allows the class to leave if they want, she stays until the last person leaves or class time ends (whichever comes first). She does NOT budge on late work; I had a family emergency and had to miss the power point presentation day (2nd to last class) and she gave me a 0 out of 50.

comments: Speech class. Catherine was helpful and supportive as long as you were willing to put in the work. Likes to come up with assignments on the fly to reward people who come to every class. Need the book for tests. She rewards those who show improvement.

comments: Prof Mattice took over this course, in her words "on short notice". Course was poorly designed but she changed it on the fly to try to make it work as best as could be. I respect her greatly for that, although it was tough to have planned on an assignment that no longer existed and a new one in it\'s place. I\'d look forward to a class w her again.

comments: Horrible experience with this professor. Very disorganized, most of the assignments did not even have due dates. There\'s a lot of reading, note taking and discussions but very little assignments. Just one big test per week which has little to do with what you learned in class. I dropped this class in the first week!
